author: rjollos
msg: Refs #162: Applied patch `t162_r1433074_bootstrap_browser.diff` from Olemis, with modifications to keep elements contained within the `#content` `div`.

author: breser
msg: Solaris does not support the gssapi library option to krb5-config, however
it does have a gssapi implementation.  Requiring us to look for the library
This is being put on a branch since trunk no longer has gssapi detection
support since it has been moved into serf.
(SVN_LIB_RA_SERF_GSSAPI): Detect when krb5-config --libs gssapi fails and
try with krb5-config --libs krb5 and then use -lgss and

author: swagle
msg: AMBARI-1557. Adding Hue service to the HDP stack definition along with the necessary configuration properties. (swagle)

author: breser
msg: Create branch to hold fixes for Kerberos/GSSAPI detection on Solaris10 on 1.7.x.
